title: Win kit signed by Simon Yates
content:
To celebrate the remarkable career of Simon Yates, Grand Tour winner and 2025 Giro d’Italia champion, we’re giving readers the chance to win a Team Visma - Lease a Bike 2025 Tour de France speedsuit signed by the rider himself and a full year of Rouleur membership.

This competition is in collaboration with our friends at Sportive Breaks. Enter here:
author: Rouleur Media
